item.title: CVE-2022-21786|2024-08-03T02:53:36.217Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6833%2C%20mt6853%2C%20mt6873%2C%20mt6877%2C%20mt6879%2C%20mt6885%2C%20mt6893%2C%20mt6895%2C%20mt6983%2C%20mt8791%2C%20mt8797%2C%20mt8798
item.description: In audio DSP, there is a possible memory corruption due to improper casting. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS06558822; Issue ID: ALPS06558822.

item.title: CVE-2022-21787|2024-08-03T02:53:36.253Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6833%2C%20mt6853%2C%20mt6873%2C%20mt6877%2C%20mt6879%2C%20mt6885%2C%20mt6893%2C%20mt6895%2C%20mt6983%2C%20mt8791%2C%20mt8797%2C%20mt8798
item.description: In audio DSP, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS06558844; Issue ID: ALPS06558844.
